My First F-Droid Archive Demo

These are the apps that have been archived from the main repo.

Currently it serves 0 apps. To add it to your F-Droid client, scan the QR code (click it to enlarge) or use this URL:

https://raw.githubusercontent.com/KingLucius/KLdroid/main/archive

If you would like to manually verify the fingerprint (SHA-256) of the repository signing key, here it is:
DD 5C EE 58 B6 C5 13 A8 94 AA A3 78 ED 7A 70 B4 A5 26 53 F5 D9 B0 E9 42 0F CB C2 D4 1F FE 22 85
